txt.en: 'Too proud to get your hands dirty, are ye?'
'Well now, you're not too proud to do the dirty work, [placeholder]...I must say that I'm impressed! You'll get the work done what needs to be done!'
Collected boar-droppings ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I know it's a dirty, job, [placeholder], but it's one what needs doing.'
Iago Glennudh is one of the most respected farmers of Maur Tulhau.

'Ha! A giant, indeed...I've seen the Rhi Helvarch at night hunting the white elk, and you've naught on him for height.

'Well, if ye want to be put to use, ye could gather fertilizer for me. I'm considered the most respected farmer in Maur Tulhau, and that's because I know what it takes to grow vegetables.

'Aye, ye know what I mean, I see...or ye think you do. Boar-droppings, Duvodiad, that's what I need. Ye can find them everywhere...ye just have to look.'
Boar-droppings can be found throughout the Gloomglens.\n\nIago Glennudh has asked you to gather boar-droppings for use as fertilizer.

'Ha! A Stone-eater, indeed...you've the look of a giant Stoor. I doubt your teeth could handle a pebble, much less a good solid rock.

'Well, if ye want to be put to use, ye could gather fertilizer for me. I'm considered the most respected farmer in Maur Tulhau, and that's because I know what it takes to grow vegetables.

'Aye, ye know what I mean, I see...or ye think you do. Boar-droppings, Duvodiad, that's what I need. Ye can find them everywhere...ye just have to look.'
Iago Glennudh is at Maur Tulhau in the Gloomglens of Enedwaith.\n\nYou should bring the boar-droppings you collected to Iago Glennudh.
'Boar-droppings...that's the secret!'

'Ha! A spirit, indeed...why, if you're a spirit, why can I touch ye?

'Well, if ye want to be put to use, ye could gather fertilizer for me. I'm considered the most respected farmer in Maur Tulhau, and that's because I know what it takes to grow vegetables.

'Aye, ye know what I mean, I see...or ye think you do. Boar-droppings, Duvodiad, that's what I need. Ye can find them everywhere...ye just have to look.'

'Maer Brocht√ª has sent me some of those seeds ye brought, [placeholder]. I can't wait to harvest my first crop of weed. Of course, no one thought to ask ye how to make one of those fancy pipes to smoke it in.

'Well, if ye would like to be of assistance to me, I have a task for ye, though I'm ashamed to ask it, as it's certainly below ye, I'm sure. I'm considered the most respected farmer in Maur Tulhau, and that's because I know what it takes to grow vegetables.

'Aye, ye know what I mean, I see...and it's a dirty job. Boar-droppings, Duvodiad, that's what I need. Ye can find them everywhere...ye just have to look.'
'Well now, you're not too proud to do the dirty work, Duvodiad...I must say that I'm impressed!'
Collect boar-droppings ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Too proud to get your hands dirty, are ye?'
Talk to Iago Glennudh at Maur Tulhau
'Well now, you're not too proud to do the dirty work, Duvodiad...I must say that I'm impressed!'
